Contact & inquiries: styleslookbook@gmail.com

summary: Out in Los Angeles, Harry was seen wearing Gucci round-frame sunglasses. These glasses feature a gold metal frame with black and...
caption:
Out in Los Angeles, Harry was seen wearing Gucci round-frame sunglasses. These glasses feature a gold metal frame with black and light tortoiseshell rim, gold metal temples with light tortoiseshell tips and bee details. Photo by joshiepaulie.

Gucci round-frame sunglasses ($420)
